阿呆の話食い: (あほうのはなしぐい) - fools act without thinking
阿呆の足下使い: (あほうのあしもとづかい) - fools use people to pick up things lying at their own feet; stupidity of using people for small things
阿呆口: (あほぐち) - stupid chatter; foolish talk
阿呆臭い: (あほうくさい) - ridiculous; stupid; laughable
阿呆陀羅経: (あほだらきょう) - mock Buddhist sutra
阿呆面: (アホづら) - stupid face; foolish look on one's face
阿呆鳥: (アホウドリ) - albatross (esp. the short-tailed albatross, Phoebastria albatrus)
阿呍: (アウン) - Om (san:)/Aun/syllable representing the primordial trinity of Vishnu, Shiva and Brahma; inspiration and expiration/respiration/alpha and omega
阿国歌舞伎: (おくにかぶき) - Okuni kabuki; progenitor of modern kabuki, developed by Izumo Taisha shrine maiden Izumo no Okuni and popularized in Kyoto (early Edo period)
阿多福: (おたふく) - homely woman (esp. one with a small low nose, high flat forehead, and bulging cheeks); plain woman
阿多福豆: (おたふくまめ) - large broad bean; (boiled and sweetened) broad bean
阿多福面: (おたふくめん) - humorous mask of a homely woman's face (characterized by a small low nose, high flat forehead, and bulging cheeks)
阿多福風邪: (おたふくかぜ) - {med} mumps; epidemic parotitis
阿娜めく: (あだめく) - to be bewitching; to look coquettish; to behave in an alluring manner; to behave in a seductive manner
阿婆擦: (あばずれ) - (阿婆 is ateji) a bitch
阿婆擦れ: (あばずれ) - (阿婆 is ateji) a bitch
阿媽: (あま) - amah (foreign maid or nursemaid working in east Asia) (por: ama)
阿字: (あじ) - the letter a (in esoteric Buddhism)
阿弗利加系亜米利加人: (アフリカけいアメリカじん) - African American
阿弗利加野驢馬: (アフリカノロバ) - African wild ass (Equus africanus)
阿弥陀堂: (あみだどう) - temple hall containing an enshrined image of Amitabha
阿弥陀如来: (あみだにょらい) - Amitabha Tathagata; Amithaba
阿弥陀籤: (あみだくじ) - ghostleg lottery; ladder lottery; lottery in which participants trace a line across a lattice pattern to determine the winner
阿弥陀被り: (あみだかぶり) - wearing a hat pushed back on one's head
阿彌陀: (あみだ) - Amitabha; ghostleg lottery/ladder lottery/lottery in which participants trace a line across a lattice pattern to determine the winner; wearing a hat pushed back on one's head
阿形: (あぎょう) - open-mouthed form (statue with open mouth, symbolizing the "a" half of "aum")
阿房払い: (あほうばらい) - stripping a samurai of clothes and swords and exiling him naked (Edo period punishment)
阿房鳥: (アホウドリ) - albatross (esp. the short-tailed albatross, Phoebastria albatrus)
阿檀: (アダン) - screw pine (Pandanus fascicularis); pandanus palm; pandanus fruit
阿武船: (あたけぶね) - large warship of the Muromachi and early Edo periods
阿毘達磨: (あびだつま) - abhidharma; texts that contain detailed reworkings of the Buddhist sutras
阿片中毒: (あへんちゅうどく) - opium addiction
阿羅漢: (あらかん) - Arhat; Buddhist monk who has attained Nirvana
阿耨多羅三藐三菩提: (あのくたらさんみゃくさんぼだい) - anuttara samyak sambodhi (supreme perfect enlightenment)
阿菊虫: (おきくむし) - chrysalis of a swallowtail butterfly (esp. of species Atrophaneura alcinous)
阿蘇山: (あそざん) - mountain in Kumamoto Prefecture
阿蘭陀: (オランダ) - Holland (por: Olanda); The Netherlands
阿蘭陀海芋: (オランダカイウ) - calla lily (Zantedeschia aethiopica)
阿諛便佞: (あゆべんねい) - (yoji) flattery; adulation; sycophancy
阿諛弁佞: (あゆべんねい) - (yoji) flattery; adulation; sycophancy
阿諛追従: (あゆついしょう) - (yoji) excessive flattery; adulation
阿逸多: (あいった) - Maitreya (bodhisattva); Ajita (one of the sixteen arhats)
阿部沙魚: (アベハゼ) - Samoan mullet goby (Mugilogobius abei)
阿閦仏: (あしゅくぶつ) - Akshobhya (the immovable buddha)
阿閦如来: (あしゅくにょらい) - Akshobhya (one of the Five Wisdom Buddhas)
阿闍世コンプレックス: (あじゃせコンプレックス) - Ajase complex (feelings of guilt towards one's mother)
阿闍梨: (あざり) - (abbr. of 阿闍梨耶, from the Sanskrit "ācārya") high monk (esp. one of correct conduct who acts as a role model for his pupils)/high priest; initiate (esp. as a formal rank in Tendai and Shingon); monk who conducts religious services
阿頼耶識: (あらやしき) - alaya-vijnana (store consciousness, consciousness forming the base of all human existence)
阿魔: (あま) - (尼 only)  nun; bitch; (abbr. 尼崎) Amagasaki, Hyogo
阿鼻叫喚: (あびきょうかん) - (yoji) agonizing cries; pandemonium; two of Buddhism's hells
阿鼻地獄: (あびじごく) - (yoji) the Avici hell, the eighth and most painful of the eight hells in Buddhism
陀羅助: (だらすけ) - traditional "Chinese" medicine for the stomach (usually prepared as small dark spherical pills)
陀羅尼: (darani) - dharani, feitiço, ladainha, cântico sânscrito multisilábico
陀羅尼助: (だらにすけ) - traditional "Chinese" medicine for the stomach (usually prepared as small dark spherical pills)
附け: (ツケ) - bill/bill of sale/payment invoice; tab (for later payment)/credit; contact move (in go)/direct attack to an enemy stone; sound effect produced by striking with clappers a wooden board in kabuki; letter; reason/motive/pretext; one's fortune/one's luck
附ける: (つける) - to attach/to join/to add/to append/to affix/to stick/to glue/to fasten/to sew on/to apply (ointment); to furnish (a house with); to wear/to put on; to keep a diary/to make an entry; to appraise/to set (a price); to allot/to budget/to assign; to bring alongside; to place (under guard or doctor); to follow/to shadow; to load/to give (courage to); to keep (an eye on); to establish (relations or understanding); to turn on (light)
附け加える: (つけくわえる) - to add one thing to another
附け狙う: (つけねらう) - to prowl after; to keep watch on
附す: (ふす) - to affix/to append/to attach; to entrust/to refer/to handle (as such); to follow (the leader); to submit (a document, etc.)
附する: (ふする) - to affix/to append/to attach; to entrust/to refer/to handle (as such); to follow (the leader); to submit (a document, etc.)
附会: (ふかい) - adding/connecting/joining; drawing a forced inference/forced analogy
附則: (ふそく) - additional rules; by-laws; supplementary provisions; additional clauses
